name: Assamite
weakness: Addicted to vitae; must resist the urge to drink from other vampires.

name: Followers of Set
weakness: Suffer penalties in bright light and take extra damage from sunlight.

name: Gangrel
weakness: Gain a permanent animal feature after each frenzy.

name: Giovanni
weakness: Their Kiss inflicts painful, damaging bites on mortals.

name: Lasombra
weakness: Cast no reflection or shadow and take extra damage from sunlight.

name: Malkavian
weakness: All members suffer from at least one permanent derangement.

name: Nosferatu
weakness: Hideous and deformed; Appearance is effectively zero.

name: Ravnos
weakness: Compelled by a personal vice; must check Willpower to resist.

name: Toreador
weakness: Entranced by art or beauty; may be immobilized without a Willpower roll.

name: Tremere
weakness: Bound by loyalty; all are one step toward a clan blood bond.

name: Tzimisce
weakness: Must rest in contact with at least two handfuls of native soil.

name: Ventrue
weakness: Can only feed on a very specific type of mortal vessel.

name: Caitiff
weakness: No clan weakness but suffer stigma; no in-clan disciplines.
